Text.Language: Hiten noueu,/ a~reh e~p~wnq m~peniwt ettai/out n~ar,ie~reuc papa abba (nim): P[oic a~rih~mot nan m~pi,w e~bol n~te nennobi.
Through their prayers, keep the life of our honored father, the archpriest, Pope Abba (...). O Lord, grant us the forgiveness of our sins.
